name: I Dream About Knights
description:
This is a submission for My First Game Jam: Summer 2017

This was the first game jam I participated in and I have to say, I enjoyed it. I Also noticed I work way better when I have a deadline. I did make a few small games before but this was the first time I made my own sprites and I think they turned out decent. I don't think the music fits very well but I didn't have much time left and did want some music.

Objective:

Kill the boss. To get to him you first have to fight your way through his minions.

Controls:

Left mouse button - Attack

Right mouse button - Block

A,D - Move

W - Jump

Escape - Menu

Tips:
  • Some attacks can be blocked by jumping.
  • Some attacks can only be blocked partly.
  • Pay attention to the indicator above the enemies.
Credits:

Background - Haruna Akatsuki

Music - Eric Matyas

Everything else - Me  

If anything goes wrong, you can restart the level in the menu!
